title: Basic Computer Course
info: Learn the basic parts of a computer, including the monitor, computer case, and keyboard.

title: Basic graphic design course
info: Graphic design is a craft where professionals create visual content to communicate messages.

title: Basic programing
info: One of the simplest high-level languages, with commands similar to English, it can be learned with relative ease even by schoolchildren and novice programmers.

title: Official computer course
info: Computer once meant a person who did computations, but now the term almost universally refers to automated electronic machinery.
